entry: \forall int i; \forall Seq s; ( i < 0 | i >= seqLen(s) -> any::seqGet(s, i)<<Trigger>> = seqGetOutside )

\forall int i; \forall Seq s1; \forall Seq s2; ( 0 <= i & i < seqLen(s1) + seqLen(s2) -> any::seqGet(seqConcat(s1, s2), i) = \if (i < seqLen(s1)) \then (any::seqGet(s1, i)) \else (any::seqGet(s2, i-seqLen(s1))))
\forall Seq s1; \forall Seq s2; seqLen(seqConcat(s1,s2)<<Trigger>>) = seqLen(s1) + seqLen(s2)
